EmailTemplate.description: The thank you email that confirms their registration. Garrett Zaino, 3/22/2012
EmailTemplate.name: NY - Networking - May 17 2012.Registered Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Registering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring 2012 Networking Reception: Zengo May 17, 2012 Thanks for registering for the New York Metropolitan Area Spring Networking Event hosted by MBO Partners! You are receiving this message to confirm your registration.
Sincerely,
MBO Partners Suggested dress code is business to business casual. Don't forget to bring your business cards! Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171
Contact Us <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
